statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM course_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT course_name, schedule_date FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND teacher_id = 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 2 ORDER BY course_id DESC, schedule_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM course_schedule GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_courses > 2 ORDER BY total_courses DESC,course_id ASC
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT room_name, capacity, building_name FROM room_allocation ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE teacher_id=101 ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM course_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule WHERE teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, room_name, building_name FROM course_schedule JOIN room_allocation ON course_schedule.course_id = room_allocation.room_id;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, day_of_week FROM course_schedule WHERE start_time >= '09:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM room_allocation WHERE capacity > 30 ORDER BY building_name, floor_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name FROM TeacherAssignment WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT room_number, building_name FROM RoomAllocation WHERE building_name = 'Main Building';
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM TeacherAssignment JOIN CourseSchedule ON TeacherAssignment.course_id = CourseSchedule.course_id;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RoomAllocation ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, course_id, course_name FROM TeacherAssignment JOIN CourseSchedule ON TeacherAssignment.course_id = CourseSchedule.course_id;
SELECT room_number, building_name FROM RoomAllocation WHERE room_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM RoomAllocation WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeacherAssignment WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT teacher_name, subject FROM TeacherAssignment WHERE teacher_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_name = 'Math' ORDER BY course_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT teacher_name, subject FROM TeacherAssignment WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%John%' AND subject = 'Science';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM RoomAllocation ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT school_name, address FROM School WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY school_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM Course_Schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM Room_Allocation WHERE capacity >= 50;
SELECT teacher_name, subject FROM Teacher_Assignment WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM Course_Schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student WHERE grade > 10 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, subject FROM Teacher_Assignment WHERE subject = 'Mathematics';
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM Room_Allocation WHERE capacity >= 30 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT school_id, school_name FROM School;
